assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Working in ensemble situation as soloist or as regular member of ensemble. Preparing the repertoire for rehearsals, performance and recording. Performing. Management.
description.et: Töö ansamblikoosseisus nii solistina kui saatjana.  Repertuaari ettevalmistamine proovideks, kontsertideks ja stuudiotööks. Erinevate akustiliste kogemuste omandamine. Lavaline käitumine. Korraldustöö ja logistika.

objectives.en: The course provides theoretical and practical skills for working in an ensemble as both a soloist and accompanist, and for conducting/instructing an ensemble.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on anda teoreetilised teadmised ja praktilised oskused tööks ansamblis nii solisti kui saatjana ning ansambli juhtimiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: The student knows the principles of ensemble instruction, can perform repertoire in a variety of styles, forms and groups, conduct their arrangement, cooperate with their ensemble members and perform both as a soloist and accompanist.
learning_outcomes.et:
Aine läbinud üliõpilane: 
*teab ja tunneb ansambli juhtimise põhimõtteid, 
*oskab esitada repertuaari erinevates stiilides, vormides ja koosseisudes, 
*oskab juhendada oma arranžeeringuid,
*oskab  teha koostööd oma ansamblipartneritega ning esineda soleerija ja saatja rollis.
